listings.comment:
I was excited to work with him, but there were a few issues:
1. After project approval, communication involved extensive back-and-forth, despite very clear goals. 
2. I planned to give him access to my Wix account to improve the site I built. Instead, he used a sandbox site and later attempted to transfer it. This caused many problems as the site’s features (e.g., shop specifications) weren’t fully duplicated which i spend hours to set up. We exchanged over 50 or so messages, leading to delays, misunderstandings, and frustration. Had he followed my initial request, it would have been a 5-star review.
3. I was uncomfortable when I noticed unfamiliar email addresses and names accessing my Wix account after inviting him. He said it is all his e-mails but why? 

I shared all of this with him directly. On a positive note, he was responsive and made an effort, which is why he received 3 or more stars in some areas.

A wonderful worker finds a way to go with the flow. He can find work around very fast and listens attentively. I enjoy working with him a very patient person, who really can make a difference. It was delivered ahead of schedule and met all my requirements. Highly recommend.

If you’re looking for a professional, well-designed website at an affordable price, He is the perfect choice. He delivered a stunning site that exceeded my expectations. He was incredibly patient and responsive with all my revision requests, making the entire process smooth and hassle-free. I’ll definitely work with him again for future projects. Highly recommend!

Working with this seller has been an absolute pleasure! Their outstanding communication skills made the entire process seamless and stress-free. They are incredibly responsive, transparent, and always kept me updated at every stage of the project. Their expertise and professionalism truly set them apart. He is a genuine pro in their field, delivering high-quality work with exceptional attention to detail. What I appreciate the most is their honesty and dedication to delivering results that exceed expectations.

Hammad delivered an outstanding work more from my expectations impressive seller and well cooperative ! Working with him was a pleasure as he was QUICK to respond went above and beyond. 🙌 Would definitely recommend!
